Sentencas: This paper presents a first part of research of designing a new Ti-Si-C-based composite for potential application as a solid oxide fuel cells interconnect material.
Titulo: Novel Ti-Si-C composites for SOFC interconnect materials: Production optimization

Sentencas: Spark plasma sintering technique was used for the production and the effects of sintering parameters on microstructure, phase composition, as well as mechanical and electrical properties were investigated.
Titulo: Novel Ti-Si-C composites for SOFC interconnect materials: Production optimization

Sentencas: Optimization of the sintering conditions then allowed to obtain a fine-grained material with properties (bending strength 433 MPa, hardness of 9.6 GPa, electrical resistance 26 mO cm) surpassing those of Crofer steels, materials typically used in the SOFC interconnect applications nowadays.
Titulo: Novel Ti-Si-C composites for SOFC interconnect materials: Production optimization

Sentencas: This is a very promising result, yielding our Ti-Si-C composite a serious candidate for new-generation lightweight interconnect materials.
Titulo: Novel Ti-Si-C composites for SOFC interconnect materials: Production optimization
